long_description: With a tailored cut and soft PVC foam, MTI(R)'s Children's PFD is so comfortable even the most fidgety youngster will keep it on. Durable 420-denier nylon oxford dries quickly and is soft against skin. Large head-support with grab loop keeps child's head afloat and allows easy retrieval. Easy-to-use #10 nylon-tooth front zipper and nylon crotch and waist straps with side-release buckles secure PFD comfortably, preventing ride-up.
short_description: With a tailored cut and soft PVC foam, MTI(R)'s Children's PFD is so comfortable even the most fidgety youngster will keep it on.
